publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1188 Robert Brown: Future of Clyde Boat Building and Marine Facilities-That the Parliament notes the historic boat and ship building tradition on the Clyde and the need for comprehensive development of the waterfront that will fully respect and cater for the river's marine heritage and regrets the loss of any existing boat and marine businesses to residential development, such as through the proposals being pursued by Clydeport to develop the area surrounding the Renfrew Ferry including the Clyde River Boat Yard and the "Old Garvel Yard".
S2M-1188 Future of Clyde Boat Building and Marine Facilities (lodged on 21 April 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
